Name: Mathematica as a Tool: An introduction with practical examples

ReviewList.Text: "New" edition but nothing new about it. old and outdated, it's a book from the nineties. Don't let the date of the "new" edition fool you. Nothing new about it. Very, very bad!

Unfortunately I (too) did not read the 'details' closely enough.  Though it shows a pub date of 2013, it is the 1994 edition.  It deals with Mathematic version 2.2, and we're currently on version 10.  Just not very helpful. (And not, I may add, very appropriate for the publisher to not make this clearer!)
